title: Bug 70773AspectJ Error: ConncurrentModificationException thrown: null
OB: In AspectJ 1.1.11 for Eclipse, build ID 1.2.0 (and also in the previous 1.1.10)on Eclipse version 3.0.0, build ID 200406351208: If I enable incrementalcompilation and make a change to a file (typing a space and deleting it, orediting a comment), I get a "ConncurrentModificationException thrown: null" error.
SR: In AspectJ 1.1.11 for Eclipse, build ID 1.2.0 (and also in the previous 1.1.10)on Eclipse version 3.0.0, build ID 200406351208: If I enable incrementalcompilation and make a change to a file (typing a space and deleting it, orediting a comment), I get a "ConncurrentModificationException thrown: null" error.
